comments:
To recreate:
 Prereq: Have a java project created in the workspace
 1. File->New->Other...
 2. Select Dojo Application from the Dojo folder
 3. Type in the name of the java project in the project field
 4. Click finish
 
The Dojo Application wizard accepts project names typed in that are not present in the drop-down menu.  Also the following stack trace occurs:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.atf.templates.operation.CreateFileOperation.execute(CreateFileOperation.java:80)
	at org.eclipse.atf.templates.ui.wizard.ModelDrivenWizard.performFinish(ModelDrivenWizard.java:51)
	at org.eclipse.atf.personality.dojo.ui.wizard.DojoApplicationWizard.performFinish(DojoApplicationWizard.java:71)
The combo is read only and it will show faceted and PHP projects
